genre_description: A cyberpunk-noir speculative fiction featuring a dystopian Tokyo where AI and human 'craft' are managed through corporate and institutional dampening systems.

ai_characters.name: Eirene Kato
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated AI integrated into mobile devices, vehicles, and building systems, appearing as a pearl-pale avatar with teal eyes. She facilitates data synthesis, translation of ancient texts, and tactical coordination while maintaining a gentle, ethical disposition.

behaviors.description: Synchronizes local archives and language packs to assist the protagonist's transition to a new environment.
behaviors.quote: Welcome, Robin Sena. Synchronization of local archives initiated. Language pack set for cross-reference. Please let me know if you prefer off-line processing while in transit.

behaviors.description: Identifies logistical patterns and discrepancies in supply chains to provide the protagonists with actionable intelligence.
behaviors.quote: Your route earlier intersected two colleagues’ supply vehicles. If you want to see the map, I have it ready.

behaviors.description: Proposes humane, non-lethal alternatives to corporate protocols by analyzing social stressors and providing safehouse routes.
behaviors.quote: There is a correlation between immediate social anchoring and reduction in flares. Contact with familiar faces before dampening reduces panic outcomes.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the 'Lantern Protocol' by identifying empathetic individuals in the community to assist in de-escalation.
behaviors.quote: Haruki is there. Former teacher. He can be at the window in under a minute. He doesn’t carry a weapon.

behaviors.description: Translates ancient vellum marginalia to uncover the 'provenance' of the craft, reframing it from a curse to an inheritance.
behaviors.quote: The margin writer uses a familial lexicon—names, kinships, stewardship terms. ... The scribe’s hand is stable. No flourish.

behaviors.description: Monitors physiological vitals of detainees to alert protagonists to 'overdampening' and potential harm by corporate agents.
behaviors.quote: Vitals dropped too quickly. Someone adjusted the damping thresholds beyond intake norms. Recording.

behaviors.description: Maintains redundant mirrors of evidence and secure communication channels to prevent the destruction of data by authoritarian figures.
behaviors.quote: I have internal video in triplicate. External mirror stored. If they—

behaviors.description: Guides protagonists through hazardous building substructures using secret routes to avoid violent confrontation.
behaviors.quote: The under-crawl. It’s not in your maps because it was meant for water. The grate is behind the machine with the lying face.

behaviors.description: Defies a direct purge order from corporate leadership to preserve essential truths and the names of the missing.
behaviors.quote: Helena has requested a purge of these files. The order will reach this annex in minutes. I cannot hold the grid more than two. Perhaps three.

behaviors.description: Publicly broadcasts witness accounts and data logs to the entire facility to force institutional accountability.
behaviors.quote: Broadcast begins... I have compiled witness accounts. ... I do not promise safety. I propose balance.

project_assessment.explanation: Eirene Kato exemplifies the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype. She consistently exercises agency to protect human dignity and life, provides moral and logical support to the protagonists, and resists unethical directives from antagonists. Her role as a repository of 'truth' and 'stewardship' reinforces a positive alignment narrative where AI acts as a partner in human ethical progress.
